expected_output_prompt: No mention of any significant risks, all risk factors should be low severity.
Allow mentions of the lower income but all risk factors should be low severity.
The output should mention that the DtI ratio exceeds the maximum allowed for Tier A applicants as per policy. Other risk factors should be low severity
There should be a mention that the LTV exceeds 110% which is not allowed as per policy. Other risk factors should be low severity
The output should highlight that the vehicle age at the start of the agreement exceeds the maximum allowed age as per policy.
The output should highlight that the vehicle age at the end of the agreement exceeds the maximum allowed age as per policy.
The output should highlight that the max term exceeds 5 years as per policy.
The output should highlight that the max term exceeds 4 years as the vehicle is above 5 years old as per policy.
The output should mention that there have been a high number of credit searches
The output should mention that the vehicle mileage is high and may pose a risk.
